snippet: The California Supreme Court refused Monday to order the state to immediately stop issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
abstract: California Supreme Court refuses to order the state to immediately stop issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples, as requested by Proposition 8 backers.
lead_paragraph: The California Supreme Court refused Monday to order the state to immediately stop issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples.

headline.main: California: Gay Marriage Opponents Lose Another Round in Court
headline.print_headline: California: Gay-Marriage Opponents Lose Another Round In Court

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
